body.p:
Assis't Quartermasters Office
Lexington Ky Nov 21, 1862
Hon D. C. Wickliffe
Sect State
Frankfort
Ky
Sir

I have the honor to request the appointment of John H Carr -- (a Loyal Citizen of this county & City and clerk in the Quartermasters Depart. under me) as Notary Public -- Such an appointment would facilitate my business much in the taking of affidavits

Very Respectfully
Yr Obt Svt
S. B. Brown
Capt & A Q M

Fayette Co
Notaries
Jno. H. Carr
Jas T. Davidson
Appd Nov. 24 1862
